TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualFile extends System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFileBase
Public MustInherit Class VirtualFile Inherits VirtualFileBase
public ref class VirtualFile abstract : System::Web::Hosting::VirtualFileBase

summary.span: 表示虚拟文件或资源空间中的一个文件对象。

span.span: Represents a file object in a virtual file or resource space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是表示虚拟文件系统中的文件的对象的基类。The class is the base class for objects that represent files in a virtual file system. 通常情况下，你会实施的后代为每个类后代在 Web 应用程序中的对象。Typically, you would implement a descendent of the class for each object descendent in your Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是类实现，它会将信息存储在具有模板文件，以返回 HTML 数据对象。The following code example is a class implementation that combines information stored in a object with a template file to return HTML data. 此代码示例适用于的代码示例并类来提供虚拟资源从数据存储区加载到对象。This code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 有关完整的编译和运行示例，说明，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the complete instructions for compiling and running the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此示例包含三个部分：类的实现，用于填充 XML 数据文件对象和页面模板文件。This example has three parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, and the page template file. 第一个代码示例是实现类。The first code example is an implementation of the class. 其构造函数使用一种方法的自定义对象返回对象。Its constructor uses a method on a custom object to return a object. 然后搜索对象来检索与提供的虚拟文件路径关联的信息。It then searches the object to retrieve the information associated with the virtual file path provided. 在方法，它会将信息从对象的模板文件，并返回组合作为对象。In the method, it combines the information from the object with a template file and returns the combination as a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#40)] 第二个示例是用来填充 XML 数据文件返回由自定义对象对象。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 数据用于演示如何使用， ，和类从外部数据，检索数据并不是为代表生产质量的数据存储区。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and classes to retrieve data from external data, and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三个示例是用作虚拟文件的模板的文本文件。The third example is the text file used as a template for the virtual file. 如由百分号 （%） 标记之间的文本表示文件中的占位符`%file%`和`%content%`。Placeholders in the file are represented by text between percent (%) marks, such as `%file%` and `%content%`. 时间戳用于监视缓存的虚拟文件数据的更改。Timestamps are used to monitor changes to cached virtual file data. ``` File name: %file%

%file%

%content%

Page timestamp: %pageTimestamp%
Data timestamp: %dataTimestamp%
Template timestamp: %templateTimestamp%

```

span.para: 继承自类，必须重写方法以返回到虚拟资源的内容的只读流。
When you inherit from the class, you must override the method to return a read-only stream to the contents of the virtual resource.

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 此实例所表示资源的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the resource represented by this instance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例是实现检索从虚拟文件信息的构造函数提供的自定义对象对象。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that retrieves virtual file information from a object provided by a custom object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#41)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsDirectory As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsDirectory { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该资源是应作为文件处理的虚拟资源。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that this is a virtual resource that should be treated as a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Open () As Stream

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回到虚拟资源的只读流。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a read-only stream to the virtual resource.
A read-only stream to the virtual file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含数据视为由文件的流类。The method returns a stream containing the data treated as a file by the class. 流是只读的可查找 (属性为 true)。The stream is read-only and is seekable (the property is true). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是的实现组合虚拟文件特定的信息和模板文件，然后返回组合的方法。The following code example is an implementation of the method that combines virtual-file-specific information with a template file and then returns the combination. 模板文件缓存可减少多次读取的文件系统检索模板文件的开销。The template file is cached to reduce the overhead of reading the file system multiple times to retrieve the template file. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#42)]

span.para: 在派生类中方法必须返回一个找到的流。如果该方法返回的流中不支持查找，如此流传递到时引发对象写出数据。发生异常的原因响应尝试读取属性，对不可查找的流，尝试访问的属性引发异常。有关详细信息，请参阅属性。

In derived classes the method must return a seekable stream. If the method returns a stream that does not support seeking, a is thrown when the stream is passed to the object to write out the data. The exception occurs because the response tries to read the property, and on a stream that is not seekable, attempting to access the property causes an exception. For more information, see the property.
